mcq.statement: Identify the sentence with the incorrect  use of conjunctive verbs.  She studied hard for the exam, however, she still failed.

options.a: She studied hard for the exam, however, she still failed.
options.b: I went to the store, bought milk, but forgot to buy eggs
options.c: I wanted to go to the beach, but my parents wouldn't let me.
options.d: He is a great singer and he can also dance.
